## Description {#details}

Algorithm-specific params for Cache-Directed Sort.

The values are tuned for the best performance of large-scale front-end bound binaries.

Definition at line 60 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/codelayout-h">CodeLayout.h</a>.
